item.title: Relayer
item.description: A relayer is a host that works as IBC to relay messages and assets between two different blockchain networks.

item.title: Revolut
item.description: Revolut is a service that provides credit cards, either physical or virtual with lot of advantages like reduced fees (or free) cash withdrawals abroad. Additionally, allows to fund the account via another credit card instantly without commission and also wire transfers, so it’s a good way to put money in and then wire it out to an exchange to quickly buy cryptocurrency.
